Html.name: Html0
Html.content:
Usually, it suffices to have root administor(s) to administrate OpenCms. The other administrative rules areÂ seldom of interest.

Roles available in all OUs, root and sub OUs, are the following. Note that most roles imply other roles, because the permissions for one role are a superset of these of other roles. We hint at these implications when describing the roles below.
